# Rage (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Targets:** One willing living creature per three levels, no two of which may be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** Concentration + 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 329

Each affected creature gains a +2 morale bonus to Strength and Constitution, a +1 morale bonus on Will saves, and a –2 penalty to AC. The effect is otherwise identical with a barbarian’s rage except that the subjects aren’t [[Fatigued|fatigued]] at the end of the rage.
